item.description:
Our January 9, 2012 speakers, Jim Mosher and Herb Loeffler, will show and describe the development of the Reel Fast fire hose winder. See  http://reelfast.info/.  In addition, Herb will update us on his Easy Down personal descender, which is scheduled for showing on The History Channel. See www.easydown.com

For more about the IANE, go to www.inventne.com

Arrive as early as 6:30 to network with others. The meeting starts promptly at 7:00. A map of MIT showing the meeting location, Room 4-231, is at http://whereis.mit.edu/?selection=4&Buildings=go. Street parking is suggested on Ames Street or Memorial Drive. Most MIT buildings have easy access and are interconnected. For more about the Inventors Association of New England, go to our website at www.inventne.com
item.name: Inventors Association of New England Monthly Meetup
